alert.note: Alert for Fayette Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 1:36PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE...TUCKER AND PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM EST... At 135 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a cold front extending from Friedens to near Audra State Park. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingwood, Parsons, Terra Alta, Davis, Thomas, Rowlesburg, Newburg, Hendricks, Hambleton, Albright, Tunnelton, and Markleysburg. This includes Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 28 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
